lama niwasawala wesena daruwange anagathaya udesa wayasa awurudu 16 ikma wu pasu ee ayata wruththiya puhunuwa labadime nawa jathika wadasatahanak pawathwa gena yamata lama sanwardhana ha kantha katayuthu amathyanshaya kriya margayak anugamanaya kara athayi lama sanwardhana ha kantha katayuthu amathi thissa karalliyadda mahatha kiya.wayasa awurudu 18 pasuwu daruwan lama niwasawala nathara kara ganimata ida kada nathi nisa eyata palamuwa ema daruwanta owunge dakshatha opnanwa wruththiya puhunuwak laba di owunge anagathaya surakshitha kirime chethanawa peradari karagena me wadapilawela kriyathmaka kerena bawa da ee mahatha pawasiya.yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathyansha ekwa ema puhunuwa wadasatahan pawathwimata katayuthu kerena athara jana samajaya ha eekabaddha kala yuthu awurudu 18 ikma wu lamun wiwidha rakiya sapaya ganime di owunata wiwidha gataluwalata muhuna pamata siduwana nisa ema daruwan udesa rakawaranaya menma jiwanopaya salasa gatha haki welenda pola awashyathawanta galapena se nawa thakshanayata anugatha wiya haki usas mattame puhunu wadasatahan pawathwimatada katayuthu kere.wayasa awurudu 16 pasu wu daruwan sandaha wruththiya puhunuwa sandaha wadasatahana anugamanaya kerunada awurudu 14 ta wadi pasal noyana lamun da lama niwasawala jiwathwana bawin owun sandaha da me wruththiya puhunuwa labadimata katayuthu kere.rupalawanya, andum masima, wadukarmika, pariganaka, pedareru, motar karmika, supaweda, konda kapima, madhya mudranaya swayanrakiya saha hotal puhunuwa yana anshaya yatathe ema wruththiya puhunu wadasatahan kriyathmaka kirimata balaporoththuwe..
